content: Quick poll: Is anyone unable to use the IG Publisher locally because they cannot install Jekyll or Ruby?
I can only use it in Docker.
I am allowed to install jekyll, but when I setup a new machine today I couldn't get jekyll installed. now I am stuck
I am starting over from a freshly imaged windows system. I think there was a java install snafu
my problem was just like this issue https://github.com/oneclick/rubyinstaller2/issues/212
